text: [ SEC‑3.7.4 ] The Vendor shall deliver to ZenLedger Corp a standalone Enterprise Audit - Log Viewer & Export module that meets or exceeds the following requirements , including but not limited to : ( a ) full compliance with all applicable SOC 2 Type‑II controls , ISO / IEC 27001 § A.12.4 , and GDPR Art . 30 , with controls in place to ensure log integrity , comprehensive access logging , and maintenance of complete and up - to - date records of data processing activities ; ( b ) support for exporting audit logs in multiple formats ( including CSV , JSON Lines ( JSONL ) , and encrypted Apache Parquet ) ; ( c ) enforcement of a mandatory minimum thirty ( 30 ) day immutable retention period for all audit logs — with optional secure cold - storage archival for a period of up to seven ( 7 ) years ; ( d ) implementation of access controls founded on role - based least - privilege principles — enforcing dual authentication for any and all data export operations ; ( e ) integration of an LLM ( Large Language Model)-based anomaly classification mechanism capable of identifying abnormal log activity patterns or access spikes and appending to any such flagged event a manifest - encoded risk score equal to or greater than 0.8 .
